EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.FTTx.none.L.N.N.12080.FTTx NAM new.Webinar Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Hear from our expert to learn the best upgrade path for your broadband network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thanks for listening to the Nokia webinar, Deploying fiber to the most economical point.
If you’d like to listen again, this webinar is available through this link <[[{{member.webinar url}}]]>.
For more information on fiber-to-the-most-economical-point (FTT$), Nokia’s unique, technology-agnostic broadband strategy, please contact our sales team for a confidential discussion about your specific broadband network challenges. Best Regards,
Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
